122.content:
Ok here are a few choices
Option 1: An adventure/romance history involving Tails on and journey without Sonic but with various characters who will join in his journey.
Option 2: A history who goes straight to the point. Only involving principally Tails and one of the female characters of Sonic.
Option 3 : Make your own story (I know yoy had better ideas).
122.title: Lucky fox.

choices: Cream knocks on her door and wants to play baby!
The white light flies out of the bag and into her mouth!
All the diapers disapear right in front of her!
14.content:
Amy was walking through the heart of station square with arms full of shopping bags. "(sigh) Another done day! I just wish I had had more time!" She sighed. As she was walking, she did not notice the little glowing white ball that slipped it's way into one of her shopping bags. When she got home, she started putting away her groceries. "hello, what's this?" Amy asked, reaching into a bag. Out came a package of diapers! "When did I buy these?" Amy read the bag.

Thinnies brand diapers are garunteed to absorb up to six wettings! New tape design for easy access. Ultra-leakproof!

"Oh, well! I don't wear diapers." Amy threw the bag onto the floor. she reached back into the shopping bag and pulled out... another package of the same diapers! She kept reaching in and pulling out more and more packages of the diapers. "Argh! Stupid Diapers! I don't need you! I am potty trained!" Just then, Amy...
14.title: Amy

just pee her pants and have another accident

15531.content:
Your Vision Slowly fades in as you awake to the sound of a screaming alarm clock. you sigh and reach over to turn it off. you sit up in your bed and look at yourself in the mirror.

"sigh... the start of another boring danm day..." you mumble as you start to get up. you looked over to your computer with hopefull eyes...

"thank god for you" you chuckled as you threw on your shirt and jeans. you finnished dressing and jumped into your chair. before you knew it, you were at writing.com

"oh, whats this we have here...?" you asked no one as you clicked on a sonic story.

hmm... so many choices... as you countinually hit the "more" link.

*sigh*

"huh?........ anybody hear?" you looked around your room, but found you were all alone

"... come on, can we do it already?" a person whined

"who's there?" you jumped out of your skin, your were so freaked out.

"stop that whining, you blue idiot, or I'll give you something to whine about!" an all-too-famailiar voice said


you slowly turned your hed towards the screen only to see a gloved hand reach out, grab yo by the collar of your shirt, and retract, taking you with it.

you were baffeled at what you saw...

1's and 0's.... everywhere!


"Oh... my..... god........"

"I know, right? pretty cool... like me....."


you looked up, only to have your fears/dreams confirmed.



as you looked up, you saw to red shoes with a white strip on each, to long blue legs, a solid, small body with two arms crossed over it. as you cept going up, you saw a cream colored mussel with a wide grin plastered on it, and two lime green eyes.


you thought that you had bashed your head on the desk or somthing.......



"no way.....""


"yep! welcome to green zone!"

"NO FREAKING WAY!" you screamed

"umm... yea! it's real" the blue hedgehog argued.

" I-I-I-I-I-... I'm IN the story?"

"Yeper!"



"but... what story am I in....?" you asked, standing up slowly


"good question..." the being said, putting his hand under his chin with a quizitive look on his face
15531.title: you get dagged into the story for taking to dan...
